mapper.select: select customer.customer_id, customer.customer_nickname, customer.customer_portrait, customer.customer_balance, customer.customer_update_time, customer.customer_state_id, customer.customer_user_id from customer where customer.customer_delete_or_not=1 and customer.customer_user_id=#{customerUserId}

select customer.customer_id, customer.customer_nickname, customer.customer_portrait, customer.customer_balance, customer.customer_update_time, customer.customer_state_id, customer.customer_user_id from customer where customer.customer_delete_or_not=1 and customer.customer_id=#{customerId}
mapper.insert: insert into customer ( customer.customer_id, customer.customer_nickname, customer.customer_portrait, customer.customer_balance, customer.customer_update_time, customer.customer_state_id, customer.customer_user_id ) values( #{customerId}, #{customerNickname}, #{customerPortrait}, #{customerBalance}, #{customerUpdateTime}, #{customerState.stateId}, #{customerUser.userId} )
